description_for_human: Plugin for typescript and javascript which uses a REST API to provide linting, auto-completion, error checking, type checking, tooltip information, and more for ts, jsx/tsx, and js files.
description_for_model: Accepts typescript and javascript code then uses typescript twoslash comment commands on said typescript code, pass it to a REST API which then provides linting, auto-completion, error checking, type checking, tooltip information, and more for ts, jsx/tsx, and js files.
